page.title: 05CHURCH: PARISH
page.content: Mr David Pritchard is the vicar of Marcham, Garford and Frilford. The vicar is responsible for quite a lot of things. If the vicar is asked to marry, bury or to baptize people who live in the village he must do so. The vicar is responsible for 3000 people in Marcham,Garford and Frilford. Christ Church is a college in Oxford. It chooses who should be the vicar for Marcham. Christ Church also owns Dove Cottage which is next to the church. The church wardens are responsible for looking after the church with the vicar. They also are responsible for Garford School which is closed down now.
